about_the_game:
Join the Discord or check out my Youtube Channel to stay up to date and share feedback!



The Empire is looking for a Champion to repel the attacks of the enemy, protect their people, secure their allies and – eventually – bring the fight to the lands of their adversaries. While you are no champion yet – with some experience and gold – could you become the Champion the Empire is looking for?

Champion of Andia is an Action RPG Arena Fighter set in a medieval fantasy world. Create a character and fight waves of enemies in a directional based melee combat system, with magic! As you complete missions, earn experience points to level up your stats and gold to buy better armor and weapons. Play Champion of Andia in singleplayer or cooperetatively with you friends! Or battle against them in Team v Team & FFA!

Fight using a direction based combat system, with magic and abilities!

Features

  • Create a champion for 5 different fantasy races!
  • Play Singleplayer or Cooperatively with friends! Or... battle against them in Team v Team!
  • +200 weapon & armor assets
  • Directional melee system
  • Dozens of spells & abilities
  • Level up system

Champion Creator

Over 200 different weapons, armor sets and helmets!

Complete Missions to earn gold & XP - play singleplayer or cooperatively with friends!

Level up your Character's attributes, spells and abilities




CoA is still in early access, and I'm looking for feedback to improve the game. More missions, enemy variety, maps, gamemodes and weapons/armor will be coming!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: n/a
